com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream

Interface Loader.Callback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChunkSampleSource, ExtractorSampleSource, HlsSampleSource, ManifestFetcher, SingleSampleSource, UtcTimingElementResolver
    Enclosing class:
    Loader

    public static interface Loader.Callback
    Interface definition for a callback to be notified of Loader events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onLoadCanceled(Loader.Loadable loadable)
      Invoked when loading has been canceled.
      void onLoadCompleted(Loader.Loadable loadable)
      Invoked when the data source has been fully loaded.
      void onLoadError(Loader.Loadable loadable, java.io.IOException exception)
      Invoked when the data source is stopped due to an error.

    • Method Detail

      • onLoadCanceled

        void onLoadCanceled(Loader.Loadable loadable)
        Invoked when loading has been canceled.
        Parameters:
        loadable - The loadable whose load has been canceled.

      • onLoadCompleted

        void onLoadCompleted(Loader.Loadable loadable)
        Invoked when the data source has been fully loaded.
        Parameters:
        loadable - The loadable whose load has completed.

      • onLoadError

        void onLoadError(Loader.Loadable loadable,
                 java.io.IOException exception)
        Invoked when the data source is stopped due to an error.
        Parameters:
        loadable - The loadable whose load has failed.
